CustomField.description: Look up the contact record in Salesforce for the Participant ReAmortizing their loan
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Look up the contact record in Salesforce for the Participant ReAmortizing their loan
CustomField.label: ReAm Participant

lookupFilter.errorMessage: If the contact doesn't appear, visit the Account record and ensure they are included as a contact with a "Contact Role" of Saver, Sponsor, Trustee or any combination of those three.

filterItems.value: Plan Sponsor, Trustee, Plan Sponsor & Trustee, Saver, Saver & Plan Sponsor, Saver & Trustee, Saver & Plan Sponsor & Trustee, Plan Sponsor & Advisor, Plan Sponsor & Trustee & Advisor, Trustee & Advisor, Saver & Advisor, Saver & Plan Sponsor & Advisor, Save
